sentence.Network_en: Doubtless he was justified in some of his criticism of the media.
sentence.Network_cn: 他对媒体的一些批评性言论无疑是合乎情理的。

sentence.Network_en: Viruses and logic bombs can doubtless do great damage under some circumstances.
sentence.Network_cn: 病毒和逻辑炸弹在某些情况下无疑会造成巨大危害。

sentence.Network_en: His direct, often abrasive approach will doubtless ruffle a few feathers.
sentence.Network_cn: 他那直截了当、往往还粗鲁生硬的办事方式无疑会激怒一些人。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 有什么以less结尾的单词么..？_百度知道 ... defenseless 无防御的 doubtless 很可能 downless 无软毛的.
大学英语六级词汇 - 豆丁网 ... doom n. 命运，厄运；绝望 doubtless a. 无疑的 drainage n. 排水；下水道.
doom n 厄运，劫数vt 注定，命定doubtless ad 无疑地，肯定地drainage n 排水系统，下水道;排水，放水.
That doubtless true , but at what cost ?, 这无疑是正确的 , 但代价是什么呢?

list.abs: That is doubtless true , but at what cost ?, 这无疑是正确的 , 但代价是什么呢?
doubtless you wish to make me appear a very eccentric character .您当然希望我是一个非常怪僻的人物。
as you doubtless already know ., 正如你很可能早已知道的那样.
as you doubtless already know ., 正如你很可能早已知道的那样.

entry.def: If you say that something is doubtless the case, you mean that you think it is probably or almost certainly the case.

example.ex: He will doubtless try and persuade his colleagues to change their minds...
example.tran: 他很可能会试图说服同事们改变主意。

example.ex: Doubtless he was justified in some of his criticism of the media...
example.tran: 他对媒体的一些批评性言论无疑是合乎情理的。

auth_sentence.content: Doubtless there's skim in the price of pumps.
auth_sentence.res_content: Doubtless there's skim in the price of pumps.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Doubtless there's skim in the price of pumps.

auth_sentence.content: Doubtless they were trying to say something about Mr Goodwin.
auth_sentence.res_content: Doubtless they were trying to say something about Mr Goodwin.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Doubtless they were trying to say something about Mr Goodwin.

auth_sentence.content: Personality is doubtless an obstacle to his recovery.
auth_sentence.res_content: Personality is doubtless an obstacle to his recovery.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Personality is doubtless an obstacle to his recovery.

stems_affixes.word_buile: bound边界+less无……的→adj.无限的,无边无际的
care关心+less无……的,不……的→不关心→粗心的,疏忽的
color颜色+less无……的,不……的→adj.无色的
doubt怀疑+less无……的,不……的→adj. 无疑的,确定的
effort努力+less无……的,不……的→adj.不费力的
fathom测量深度;长度单位[6英尺]+less无……的,不……的→没法测量→深不可测的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 无错误的,无缺点的,完美的
stems_affixes.word_buile: fault犯错误,欺骗+less无……的,不……的→adj.无错误的,无缺点的,完美的
feck价值,效果+less无……的,不……的→adj.无目标无计划的
flaw瑕疵+less无……的,不……的→adj.完美的,无瑕疵的
grace优美,文雅+less无……的,不……的→adj.粗俗的
hap机会,运气+less无→无运气的
help帮助+less无……的,不……的→adj.无助的,无能的,没用的
home家+less无……的,不……的→adj.无家可归的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 没有希望的,绝望的,不可救药
stems_affixes.word_buile: hope希望+less无……的,不……的→adj.没有希望的,绝望的,不可救药
nerve神经,胆量,勇气+less无……的,不……的→adj.无力的,无勇气的
regard注视;尊敬+less无……的,不……的→不注视,不尊敬→不放在眼里→不注意的
relent变宽厚,变温和+less无……的,不……的→adj.无情的,残酷的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 得不到休息的,不平静的,不安宁的
stems_affixes.word_buile: rest休息,静止+less无……的,不……的→adj.得不到休息的,不平静的,不安宁的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 不省人事的,无感觉的,无意识的
stems_affixes.word_buile: sense感觉+less无……的,不……的→adj.不省人事的,无感觉的,无意识的
spine脊骨,书脊+less无……的,不……的→没骨气的
tire疲劳,劳累+less无……的,不……的→adj.不疲劳的
value价值+less无……的,不……的→adj.不足道的
regard注视;尊敬+less无……的,不……的→不注视,不尊敬→不放在眼里→不注意的

sentences.en: She is doubtless my best friend.
sentences.cn: 她无疑是我最好的朋友。

sentences.en: It will doubtless rain on the day of the garden party.
sentences.cn: 游园会那天很可能会下雨。

jushi.english: Doubtless, he is the very man I'm looking for.
jushi.chinese: 无疑,他正是我要找的人。

jushi.english: She is doubtless my best friend.
jushi.chinese: 她无疑是我最好的朋友。
